thread.title: BRIEF-Formfactor Inc Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.03

title: BRIEF-Formfactor Inc Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
Formfactor Inc Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - FormFactor Inc: * FORMFACTOR, INC. REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03
* Q1 REVENUE $118.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $116.1 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.16 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 GAAP NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE $0.08 TO $0.14
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE $0.20 TO $0.26
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $129.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
